NAME : Hydrocodone CHEMICAL NAME : 4,5a epoxy-3-methyoxy-17-methylmorphinan-6-one tartrate (1:1) hydrate (2:5) ALTERNATE NAMES : Vicodin (with acetaminophen/paracetamol) CHEMICAL FORMULA C 18 H 21 NO 3 C 4 H 6 O 6 -2½H 2 O
